items.content_html: A lightweight web audio player to listen to the various albums and EP's of Burner Records. Create, remove, and modify songs in a Queue. Auto-play available on desktop. Sort the song list using different criteria. Listen to the burner catalog on the go using the mobile site as well.
items.title: ForestW70/sketches-bcc-client: A lightweight web audio player to listen to the various albums and EP's of Burner Records. Create, remove, and modify songs in a Queue. Auto-play available on desktop. Sort the song list using different criteria. Listen to the burner catalog on the go using the mobile site as well.

items.content_html: This is a music player that is designed to be lightweight and play music from your home computer rather than from the Internet. Users can choose a folder and the program will automatically search that folder for MP3 files to add to the library. If this project becomes advanced enough, I may upgrade it to become a hybrid music player (i.e. play music online and from your computer).
items.title: dommie123/WaveMusic: This is a music player that is designed to be lightweight and play music from your home computer rather than from the Internet. Users can choose a folder and the program will automatically search that folder for MP3 files to add to the library. If this project becomes advanced enough, I may upgrade it to become a hybrid music player (i.e. play music online and from your computer).
